verses.name: Zephaniah 1:14
verses.text: The great day of the Lord is near, it is near, and hasteth greatly, even the voice of the day of the Lord: the mighty man shall cry there bitterly.

verses.name: Zephaniah 1:15
verses.text: That day is a day of wrath, a day of trouble and distress, a day of wasteness and desolation, a day of darkness and gloominess, a day of clouds and thick darkness,

verses.name: Zephaniah 1:16
verses.text: A day of the trumpet and alarm against the fenced cities, and against the high towers.
